content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) connected to:
  - Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
  - Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
  - Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between chests and furnace
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5) for storage

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) connected to:
  - Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5)
  - Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
  - Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5)
  - Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), and (-14.5, -47.5) for storage
- Wooden Chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -45.5), and (-11.5, -45.5) for storage

### Iron Plate Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-11.0, -48.0) and (-9.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), and (-7.5, -48.5) for transferring items
- Wooden Chest at position (-9.5, -49.5) for storage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure the entity you are trying to refuel exists at the specified position. Double-check the coordinates and ensure the entity is present before attempting to refuel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
